name: Army Helicopter Shooting Game: Flying Sim Games 3D
name_original: Army Helicopter Shooting Game: Flying Sim Games 3D
description:
If you love war games you will definitely love this army helicopter game!

Choose a helicopter among the four available and be ready to destroy enemies!

Your flight begins quietly, you fly over an island with your helicopter when suddenly your enemies begin to appear on your path!

You will have to show that you're the number one helicopter pilot! The goal is to not crash your copter against any other plane and avoid to being shot!

The longer you'll manage to survive in the air, the higher will your points be!

Try to make it to the top of the worldwide leader boards!

Don't let your helicopter run out of energy and try to be precise during your flight to maintain the helicopter safe!

Features of this Helicopter Game:

◉ Shooting War Helicopters!
◉ Beautiful and detailed graphics!
◉ Army Survival race without limits!
◉ High speeds!
◉ Global ranking table!
◉ Exciting Music!
◉ Free Helicopter Game!

If you enjoy the playing this helicopter game you can rate it with five stars to help us develop more games!

We answer to each of your comments as they seem very important to us!

Defend your territory in the best army helicopter game!

Twitter: @Oscarminigames
Facebook: www.facebook.com/OscarMiniGames
